definitions.meaning: to want; to need; to ask for

sentences.translation: I want a cup of coffee.

sentences.simplifiedText: 如果你想去那个音乐会，你应该提早要门票。
sentences.traditionalText: 如果你想去那個音樂會，你應該提早要門票。
sentences.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng qù nàgè yīnyuèhuì, nǐ yīnggāi tízǎo yào ménpiào.
sentences.translation: If you want to go to that concert, you should ask for tickets in advance.

sentences.simplifiedText: 如果你想学好这门课，你需要每天学习。
sentences.traditionalText: 如果你想學好這門課，你需要每天學習。
sentences.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng xué hǎo zhè mén kè, nǐ xūyào měitiān xuéxí.
sentences.translation: If you want to do well in this class, you need to study every day.

sentences.simplifiedText: 您的反馈对我们的工作非常重要。
sentences.traditionalText: 您的反饋對我們的工作非常重要。
sentences.pinyin: Nín de fǎnkuì duì wǒmen de gōngzuò fēicháng zhòngyào.
sentences.translation: Your feedback is very important to our work.
